document_data.name: Philaspur Olósynne
document_data.mainbody: King '''Philaspur''' was the fourth monarch of the [[Olósynne Dynasty]] of [[Aglarond]] in the late 12{{th}} century [[DR]]. He reigned from [[1194 DR]] to his death in battle in [[1197 DR]].
document_data.History:
Following the death of his elder brother, King Elthond, in the [[Battle of the Singing Sands]] against the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]] in the {{YearlinkName|1194}}, Philaspur succeeded him as king of Aglarond.

He died in the {{YearlinkName|1197}}, during the [[Battle of Brokenhands]] against the [[Thayan]] people.
document_data.Relationships:
He was the son of [[Althon Olósynne|Althon "the Old"]] and the younger brother of [[Elthond Olósynne|Elthond]].

His daughters, who would rule the nation after his death, were the twins [[Thara Olósynne|Thara]] and [[Ulae Olósynne|Ulae]], more commonly known as the Gray Sisters.
